name: Brick^2 (Brick by Brick) DEMO
description:
WASD to move, mouse to look, Ctrl to crouch.

Here is a unity scene I have been using for prototyping most of my learning in unity.  This is essentially my 'first' actual unity project made entirely by me. (My first time working in unity was 2 weeks ago, using the standard Unity FPS Tutorial module). This was a learning process involving textures, cameras, scripting, modeling, inputs, play controlling, player movement, and more. Overall I call it an "exploration of play and design concepts brought about while learning the workings of unity" since I hesitate to call it a prototype.

Note that you will probably have to double click on the screen to prevent your mouse from escaping, as well as maybe changing your mouse DPI. 

It is highly recommended that you look at my portfolios description and explanation of this prototype for a complete understanding of it.

https://calvinhilgert.wixsite.com/portfolio/2
